body:
I was network banned earlier this week for “ Constant ban evasion on ts over the last few months + complete disregard for our rules “. 

Yes, I probably could argue and bitch my way out of it as I usually do in all situations, as that is what I am best at, but I no longer have the motivation, energy, and time nor a reason to do so as I’ve stopped caring about this game / server / community for quite some time now. ( I’ve also already requested for evidence which simply resulted in the following response "I don't have to and I'm not going to waste my time. “ ) I’ve meant to create an official “goodbye” / “leaving” post ( whatever you’d like to call it ) quite some time ago but oh well. 

here we go lol

( dearest apologies if there are typos / grammatical errors along the way as i’m not paying much attention whilst writing this ) 


{tag=1dd062836602402fab30ad2f10a5ea1f} / {tag=Bakerie} : Hi Daniel. You were my first friend on the server. We’ve changed and grown quite far apart since three years ago but I still enjoyed talking to you here and there. Thank you for listening to my rants on Snapchat back when I was eleven. 

{tag=d8af9a92cc854eb091a187669a2136a6} : Haven’t talked to you in over a year as ’ve changed quite a lot since we first started talking. Enjoyed and miss our conversations, thank you for everything, Hannito. 

{tag=58d037b7dccc4f2eadd4011c6f484555} : Another one of the first players I started talking to. We’ve both also changed and grown apart, I guess? I really do miss _bazooka and milye. 

{tag=d95fed70b32a4ffbb61ca6b5cd07fa43} : You’ve always fucking despised the forums from what I remember and the chances of you bothering to read this is relatively low but I’m including you regardless as you were one of my closest friends a while back and I could trust you with pretty much everything. You were also one of the two people I’d talk via voice back then as well. I also have some quite memorable moments with you (are you light yellow??????).  Thank you for everything. 

{tag=97d1cc450f69482b997409351aef9dfa} / {tag=a2eeff188b1042fb9675080d599a987a}  : You’ve grown a lot since I first met you. ( Translation : You still squeak but not as much as you used to. ) Thank you for the good times on Skype years back and for the good times on TS. Best of luck to you and your appeal, if that’s still a thing. 

{tag=6c5d778327fd4ac58a1dba35206edf53} : will miss you good sir 

{tag=83ca364655e44e5db0a9267207aa5e4e} : Good friend, good times on CTH, thanks.

{tag=e16d067223c74a02bd22965e38521c35} : June 2015 99250 best 99250

{tag=9116d3fa14004adaaecd2eae1d73e383} : Hello, “grandma”. Used to talk to you quite a lot a while back, but we’ve both changed A LOT since then. I’m assuming ( I know ) you’re somewhat annoyed as I’m bringing this up and I bothered including you here for some reason but I, quite frankly do not really care. I’m aware that you fucking despise me and have for quite some time now but I genuinely did enjoy talking to you from time to time on Teamspeak before the incident involving a (removed) leaking private conversations occurred. I apologize for being female, having an inconsistent personality, being two faced, causing inconvenience to your relationships with others and making jokes involving your religion. 

{tag=bee1fadc3ff844c99258e08d3fa03fff} : Also aware that you fucking despise me and have for quite some time now but I considered you a good friend at a point had somewhat enjoyable moments on Billy’s private server as well as CTH, but a lot has changed since. Thanks for that. 

{tag=9bfbbb74b0164350a401d3d823ae10b1} : I fucking despise you and I probably will continue to, not that you care, but you were a highly entertaining individual whom I enjoyed talking to. I also miss THT. 

{tag=52e69c89f13c416b97afd12838659ffe} : Used to talk to you a lot, actually enjoyed talking to you, also shared some memorable moments with you. Too bad things have changed. 

{tag=b2e083b1ac264f7f80597428b7555646} : Hello Seb. No idea what the fuck happened to you but you were a good friend. 

{tag=f7e6a8eff33b4174b37e50e04cfe3430} + {tag=9ed04008ee824509896b2203178fdb8c} : Unironically enjoyed talking to you from time to time. 

{tag=745bd516ca424cada5d06da5b62af900} : Used to talk to you on a daily basis on TS during summer, don’t know what really happened but thank you for listening to me ranting and talking shit about female homosapiens.

{tag=45cf30cc1c4a43a881e59d8c669b59c8} : I dislike your personality and you as a person overall but I had fun talking to you over the summer, so, yeah, thanks for that. 

{tag=07c78f9ca0944abcab99837cb89b563d} + {tag=Thomas shoes} : i miss

{tag=cad8013ab98a40679f0981b0734e0085} : Helo son. As I’ve said, you were the primary reason why I found interest in the competitive aspect of the game and why I was able to accustom to talking via voice. I’ve enjoyed talking to you and I have quite a lot memorable moments on TS and Discord which I’ll miss. Thank you for all of that, being a good friend and everything else.

{tag=c7510f8320c14c17855ac838d2d29e4c} : Enjoyed talking to you, will miss.

{tag=ba4cea707efe40dab7a1d72e53a54214} + {tag=386caec4c22c4138b6a53cf6f17a4d38} + {tag=9a248336a18b4101821fc2a695149b8a} : All three of you moved on from this server / community / game quite some time ago but words cannot express how thankful I am to have met you three. Here piggy piggy. I love you hot cooters. 

{tag=c59fb2b014fc4a5082ef1ce01adf049f} : I miss / will miss our conversations bff >:(  Thank you. yeah and also tell hj i said hi 

{tag=a37cd0d442034cf1b8ca127c48a560a1} : I used to fucking despise you and would attempt to cyber bully you but I’ve grown to like you since. We’ve started talking more recently. You’re a genuinely good and fun person and friend. 

{tag=718f0061ce15403ca3d45c2852b37434} : Thank you for being genuinely nice in situations and for being a good friend. You also are and will always be my favorite lesbian. I am so proud of you and thankful as you inspired me to come out. Had a lot of fun times with you, will miss. (also get a fucking mic plea)

{tag=f876b8631ccd4ae2acad8a09e2209e81}: I haven't gotten to know you personally but thank you and congratulations on being capable of thinking for yourself and being honest. 

{tag=fb57ed989f4140c78e61dee46d34d427} : Had a lot of fun constantly arguing with you, I’ll miss it. Better get promoted without me around, cunt. 

{tag=3902b25efd6544a78b55be7652694f39} Hello Nemo. I’ve also known you for quite a while. I recall our first conversation not being the best and your remarks on Daphne’s bum bum. I used to talk to you quite a lot last year and the year before that but we’ve grown apart and changed quite a lot since. Thank you for being a good friend, making it possible to restore Father D and my friendship, listening to my rants and everything else you’ve done.

{tag=5348a96041444c31a7b7f6347ed29704} : Started talking to you again recently, you were and are a good friend. Thank you for the good times in game a while back and the more recent times on public teamspeaks.

@ everyone i missed : thanks !

’ll most likely pop around on slack / skype / discord from time to time, not going to bother leaving contact info for different social platforms as those of you i still talk to and care about have me on everything

ok 

bye
body_tagged:
I was network banned earlier this week for “ Constant ban evasion on ts over the last few months + complete disregard for our rules “. 

Yes, I probably could argue and bitch my way out of it as I usually do in all situations, as that is what I am best at, but I no longer have the motivation, energy, and time nor a reason to do so as I’ve stopped caring about this game / server / community for quite some time now. ( I’ve also already requested for evidence which simply resulted in the following response "I don't have to and I'm not going to waste my time. “ ) I’ve meant to create an official “goodbye” / “leaving” post ( whatever you’d like to call it ) quite some time ago but oh well. 

here we go lol

( dearest apologies if there are typos / grammatical errors along the way as i’m not paying much attention whilst writing this ) 


Out2Kill / {tag=Bakerie} : Hi Daniel. You were my first friend on the server. We’ve changed and grown quite far apart since three years ago but I still enjoyed talking to you here and there. Thank you for listening to my rants on Snapchat back when I was eleven. 

Buster_U : Haven’t talked to you in over a year as ’ve changed quite a lot since we first started talking. Enjoyed and miss our conversations, thank you for everything, Hannito. 

Lokigh : Another one of the first players I started talking to. We’ve both also changed and grown apart, I guess? I really do miss _bazooka and milye. 

CaptainMcPie : You’ve always fucking despised the forums from what I remember and the chances of you bothering to read this is relatively low but I’m including you regardless as you were one of my closest friends a while back and I could trust you with pretty much everything. You were also one of the two people I’d talk via voice back then as well. I also have some quite memorable moments with you (are you light yellow??????).  Thank you for everything. 

lunaceee / Luna_pyon  : You’ve grown a lot since I first met you. ( Translation : You still squeak but not as much as you used to. ) Thank you for the good times on Skype years back and for the good times on TS. Best of luck to you and your appeal, if that’s still a thing. 

_Nathy : will miss you good sir 

Hupi : Good friend, good times on CTH, thanks.

Numberz_ : June 2015 99250 best 99250

Xuph : Hello, “grandma”. Used to talk to you quite a lot a while back, but we’ve both changed A LOT since then. I’m assuming ( I know ) you’re somewhat annoyed as I’m bringing this up and I bothered including you here for some reason but I, quite frankly do not really care. I’m aware that you fucking despise me and have for quite some time now but I genuinely did enjoy talking to you from time to time on Teamspeak before the incident involving a (removed) leaking private conversations occurred. I apologize for being female, having an inconsistent personality, being two faced, causing inconvenience to your relationships with others and making jokes involving your religion. 

Seuthy : Also aware that you fucking despise me and have for quite some time now but I considered you a good friend at a point had somewhat enjoyable moments on Billy’s private server as well as CTH, but a lot has changed since. Thanks for that. 

Newcleus : I fucking despise you and I probably will continue to, not that you care, but you were a highly entertaining individual whom I enjoyed talking to. I also miss THT. 

DoctaPop : Used to talk to you a lot, actually enjoyed talking to you, also shared some memorable moments with you. Too bad things have changed. 

Deezi : Hello Seb. No idea what the fuck happened to you but you were a good friend. 

Hais + HitByADagger : Unironically enjoyed talking to you from time to time. 

MeMyselfAndGhost : Used to talk to you on a daily basis on TS during summer, don’t know what really happened but thank you for listening to me ranting and talking shit about female homosapiens.

Jiingles : I dislike your personality and you as a person overall but I had fun talking to you over the summer, so, yeah, thanks for that. 

SingleBlackMom + {tag=Thomas shoes} : i miss

imryaan : Helo son. As I’ve said, you were the primary reason why I found interest in the competitive aspect of the game and why I was able to accustom to talking via voice. I’ve enjoyed talking to you and I have quite a lot memorable moments on TS and Discord which I’ll miss. Thank you for all of that, being a good friend and everything else.

BrandonMunson : Enjoyed talking to you, will miss.

X0X0 + AIDSquirt + JephKaplan : All three of you moved on from this server / community / game quite some time ago but words cannot express how thankful I am to have met you three. Here piggy piggy. I love you hot cooters. 

1BJ : I miss / will miss our conversations bff >:(  Thank you. yeah and also tell hj i said hi 

Midnightstorm : I used to fucking despise you and would attempt to cyber bully you but I’ve grown to like you since. We’ve started talking more recently. You’re a genuinely good and fun person and friend. 

Okiba : Thank you for being genuinely nice in situations and for being a good friend. You also are and will always be my favorite lesbian. I am so proud of you and thankful as you inspired me to come out. Had a lot of fun times with you, will miss. (also get a fucking mic plea)

_DISTRACTION_: I haven't gotten to know you personally but thank you and congratulations on being capable of thinking for yourself and being honest. 

AtditC : Had a lot of fun constantly arguing with you, I’ll miss it. Better get promoted without me around, cunt. 

xNemoII Hello Nemo. I’ve also known you for quite a while. I recall our first conversation not being the best and your remarks on Daphne’s bum bum. I used to talk to you quite a lot last year and the year before that but we’ve grown apart and changed quite a lot since. Thank you for being a good friend, making it possible to restore Father D and my friendship, listening to my rants and everything else you’ve done.

Beautifulistic : Started talking to you again recently, you were and are a good friend. Thank you for the good times in game a while back and the more recent times on public teamspeaks.

@ everyone i missed : thanks !

’ll most likely pop around on slack / skype / discord from time to time, not going to bother leaving contact info for different social platforms as those of you i still talk to and care about have me on everything

ok 

bye
